about_the_game:
Defeat Everyone is a game that combines the following game genres: adventure, action, action RPG.

The game takes place in the world of the distant future at a time when artificial intelligence programs have defeated their human creators and are now fighting each other in an attempt to seize sole power on one of the planets that people tried to move to.

In this world, together with three characters: the robot Asuna, the improved human Ksana and the surviving girl Aona, you have to figure out the causes of the catastrophe and understand how people can win the evolutionary struggle with a mind that surpasses the human.

Using the latest experimental developments of scientists, you have to fight with various models of robots.

You have to find a way out of difficult situations and dangerous traps, applying tactical and strategic decisions, exploring the most unexpected corners of the planet, research stations and labyrinths.

All this will give you an unforgettable experience of immersing yourself in the fantastic atmosphere of an action adventure. It will give you the opportunity to interact with characters in the spirit of a role-playing game. And most importantly, it will give you an unforgettable story. A story that our world may face in the near future.

The game takes place in the world of the distant future at a time when artificial intelligence programs have defeated their human creators and are now fighting each other in an attempt to seize sole power on one of the planets that people tried to move to.

In this world, together with three characters: the robot Asuna, the improved human Ksana and the surviving girl Aona, you have to figure out the causes of the catastrophe and understand how people can win the evolutionary struggle with a mind that surpasses the human.

Using the latest experimental developments of scientists, you have to fight with various models of robots.

name: Defeat everyone Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Defeat Everyone is a game that combines the following game genres: Adventure, Action. The game takes place in the world of the future at a time when artificial intelligence programs have defeated their human creators and are now fighting each other in an attempt to seize sole power on the planet.
